page.title: 15SHOPPING
page.content: The only shop we have in our block is {Careby Post Office}which also sells stationery, sweets and cigarettes. The two small shops in Little Bytham (actually just outside our block) are almost 2 kilometres from Careby. To supplement these, there are various{travelling vans.}A butcher calls twice a week, a baker three times a week and Little Bytham has a mobile shop once a week. The fish and chip van visits the villages on a Tuesday evening. { Deliveries}of newspapers and post are made every day except Sunday. Little Bytham has two milk rounds. Most people do their main shopping in the nearby towns of Stamford and Bourne about 11km away. Grantham is about 26km away, Peterborough about 30km. Though Stamford and Grantham are on a bus route, it is very limited.
